title: Coupefill AFFF PFAS MDL Class Action Notice Request

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Dear sirs, although I previously submitted a request and sent payment, you rejected my request because according to you payment was received after your self-imposed deadline of July 7, 0206.  Accordingly, I submit this request (again) for all records, including without limitation correspondence, class and summary notices, claim forms and addendums, correspondence, and payments, checks and vouchers related to or in connection with the proposed or approved settlement of the  In Re: Aqueous Film-Forming Foams Products Liability Litigation, MDL No. 2:18-mn-2873-RMG and the related class action case of City of Camden, et al., v. 3M Company, No. 2:23-cv-03147-RMG pending in the multi-district litigation in the United States District Court for the District of South Carolina.  If you have any further issues, questions, or comments please contact me through this site with a copy please to lawoffice@rlteel.com.  You may also telephone me at 718-570-7509 with any questions you may have.  Please apply the prior payment to this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robert Teel
